column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " Uh , Naga what are you doing ?
#Text=" Korra says : " What , is , that ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Got it !
#Text=Do n't got it !
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Korra !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Spirit , why are you angry with us ?
#Text=What have we done to offend you ?
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Go in peace .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Korra !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Are you all right ?
#Text=" Korra says : " How are you able to control that spirit when no one else could ?
#Text=" Unalaq says : " As your father could tell you , I have spent my life studying the spirits and learning their ways .
#Text=All of this knowledge is lost in the South , but I could teach you everything I know .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Chief Unalaq , clearly you are very knowledgeable , but Korra still has much to learn about airbending .
#Text=And I hope that going to the air temples will help her connect with the past Avatars .
#Text=" Korra says : " Ugh " Unalaq says : " The air temples will teach her nothing .
#Text=Only I can give her the training she needs to be a complete Avatar .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " I 've told you that will not happen !
#Text=" Korra says : " Hey !
#Text=I 'm right here !
#Text=Anyone want to ask me what I think ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Korra , please listen .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm tired of listening to you .
#Text=Both of you .
#Text=You keep me locked up , telling me you know what 's best .
#Text=But both of you were powerless against the spirit attack .
#Text=I think it 's time I had a new teacher .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Now Korra — " Korra says : " Unalaq has proven he 's the only one who knows what I need to learn .
#Text=I have to go with him .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Please , I know you 're angry , but we 've come so far together .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm sorry , Tenzin .
#Text=This is as far as we go .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " It has been a pleasure serving you , Avatar Korra .
#Text="
